article.headline: Slack acquires business directory provider Rimeto for undisclosed sum
article.body: Instant messaging platform Slack Technologies Inc. WORK, +3.36% said Wednesday it has acquired Rimeto, a provider of business directory services for an undisclosed sum. Rimeto "offers an enterprise wide, searchable directory, automatically integrating information from across your company to deliver rich profiles of every employee, their skills, experience, and current projects," Slack said in a statement. Slack is not updating guidance for fiscal 2021 provided on June 4 as the acquisition is not expected to have a material impact on its results. Shares were up 1% premarket and have gained 40% in the year to date, while the S&P 500 SPX, +0.87% has fallen 2.7%.
